mapper.insert: insert into invoice_info (invoice_id, company_id, invoice_type, invoice_amount, recv_amount, tax, invoice_status, recv_date, invoice_content, delivery_id, remark, bank_flow_file, auth_letter_file, contract_id) values (#{invoiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recvAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{invoiceStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recvDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{invoiceContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankFlowFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authLetterFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update invoice_info set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_type = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_amount = #{invoiceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, recv_amount = #{recvAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tax = #{tax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, invoice_status = #{invoiceStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recv_date = #{recvDate,jdbcType=DATE}, invoice_content = #{invoiceContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_id = #{deliveryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_flow_file = #{bankFlowFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auth_letter_file = #{authLetterFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where invoice_id = #{invoiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select invoice_id, company_id, invoice_type, invoice_amount, recv_amount, tax, invoice_status, recv_date, invoice_content, delivery_id, remark, bank_flow_file, auth_letter_file, contract_id from invoice_info where invoice_id = #{invoiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
